snippet: HanesBrands picks Elevate Studios of Chicago to be its first digital agency of record, and Heineken chooses Droga5’s Sydney office to create campaigns for Tiger beer.
lead_paragraph: HanesBrands picks Elevate Studios of Chicago to be its first digital agency of record, and Heineken chooses Droga5’s Sydney office to create campaigns for Tiger beer.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
